faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: Visa, MasterCard, Amex, PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and bank transfer for large orders.

faqs.question: Is my payment secure?
faqs.answer: Yes—PCI-DSS compliant gateways, TLS 1.2+, and 3-D Secure where supported.

faqs.question: Which currencies can I pay in?
faqs.answer: Prices default to EUR. You can view USD/GBP; final charge settles in EUR.

faqs.question: Do you offer installments?
faqs.answer: For EU/US we support select buy-now-pay-later partners on eligible baskets.

faqs.question: Can I pay by bank transfer?
faqs.answer: Yep—for orders over €2,000. Upload proof to speed up processing.

faqs.question: Will I receive an invoice?
faqs.answer: Automatically emailed after payment and available in your account.

faqs.question: Can I change or cancel my order?
faqs.answer: Within 24h for in-stock items. Made-to-order locks once production starts.

faqs.question: Do you price match?
faqs.answer: We review official quotes on identical items before purchase. Not guaranteed.

faqs.question: Do you charge VAT?
faqs.answer: EU consumers: VAT included. Valid EU VAT IDs: reverse charge where eligible. Non-EU: no VAT from us; local taxes may apply.

faqs.question: Can I order by phone or email?
faqs.answer: Sure—our sales team can build the cart and send a secure pay link.

faqs.question: Why was my card declined?
faqs.answer: Common reasons: AVS/3DS mismatch, daily limits, or bank blocks. Try another method or call your bank.

faqs.question: Do you collect sales tax outside the EU?
faqs.answer: We don’t. Carriers or customs may collect duties/taxes at import.

faqs.question: Can I split payment across methods?
faqs.answer: Yes for card + bank transfer. Contact support to arrange.

faqs.question: Do you offer gift cards?
faqs.answer: Digital gift cards in EUR, delivered by email, valid 24 months.

faqs.question: Can I apply multiple promo codes?
faqs.answer: One promo per order unless stated otherwise.

faqs.question: Do you ship worldwide?
faqs.answer: Yes—from Italy to 100+ countries via trusted freight partners.

faqs.question: What are your lead times?
faqs.answer: In-stock: ship in 2–4 business days. Made-to-order: typically 6–10 weeks plus transit.

faqs.question: How long is transit?
faqs.answer: EU: 3–7 business days. North America: 7–14. APAC/ME: 10–18. Remote areas may take longer.

faqs.question: Which delivery services do you offer?
faqs.answer: Curbside, Inside Delivery, and White-Glove (room of choice + assembly). Availability varies by postcode.

faqs.question: How is shipping cost calculated?
faqs.answer: Based on size, weight, destination, service level, and access conditions.

faqs.question: Do you offer free shipping?
faqs.answer: Occasionally for promos or minimums. Check the banner at checkout.

faqs.question: Will I get tracking?
faqs.answer: Yes—tracking email when your order leaves our warehouse.

faqs.question: Can I schedule my delivery?
faqs.answer: White-Glove includes scheduling. Freight will call/text to confirm a window.

faqs.question: What about building access restrictions?
faqs.answer: Tell us about stairs, elevators, permits, or narrow doors beforehand so we plan the right crew.

faqs.question: Do you deliver on weekends?
faqs.answer: Select cities only. Surcharges may apply.

faqs.question: Can I ship to a PO box?
faqs.answer: No—furniture ships via freight to physical addresses only.

faqs.question: Do you offer stair carries?
faqs.answer: Yes—up to specified flights with White-Glove. Extra fees for complex access.

faqs.question: What if I miss delivery?
faqs.answer: The carrier will reschedule; storage/redelivery fees may apply.

faqs.question: Can I hold shipment for later?
faqs.answer: We can store finished goods for 30 days free; fees after that.

faqs.question: Can I ship to multiple addresses?
faqs.answer: Place separate orders or ask our team to split the shipment.

faqs.question: Do you palletize orders?
faqs.answer: Yes—export-grade pallets, corner protectors, and shrink wrap as needed.

faqs.question: Are island/remote surcharges a thing?
faqs.answer: Sometimes. They’re shown at checkout or quoted by our team.

faqs.question: Do you consolidate shipments?
faqs.answer: We can ship as items complete or consolidate on request to minimize deliveries.

faqs.question: Can I collect from your warehouse?
faqs.answer: Yes—by appointment from our Italy facility. Bring ID and order number.

faqs.question: Do you remove old furniture?
faqs.answer: In select cities with White-Glove. Add disposal during checkout.

faqs.question: Do you ship assembled?
faqs.answer: Large items ship assembled or partially; flat-pack includes hardware and guides.

faqs.question: Can I change my delivery address?
faqs.answer: Before dispatch: free. After dispatch: reroute fees may apply.

faqs.question: Do you ship to freight forwarders?
faqs.answer: Yes—provide forwarder details. Risk transfers upon hand-off.

faqs.question: Do you provide liftgate service?
faqs.answer: Yes for curbside in most regions; included for heavy pallets.

faqs.question: What happens if the box looks damaged?
faqs.answer: Note it on the delivery slip, take photos, and contact us within 48h.

faqs.question: Who pays import duties?
faqs.answer: Buyer pays in DAP terms unless otherwise stated. We can quote DDP in select countries.

faqs.question: Will you provide HS codes?
faqs.answer: Yes—commercial invoice lists HS codes, value, origin, and materials.

faqs.question: Can you help with customs clearance?
faqs.answer: Our carriers handle clearance; we supply any docs they need.

faqs.question: What’s your return window?
faqs.answer: 30 days on stock items in original packaging. Custom and clearance are final.

faqs.question: How do I start a return?
faqs.answer: Request a return label in your account or contact support with photos.

faqs.question: Who pays return shipping?
faqs.answer: Change of mind: you. Fault/our mistake: we cover it.

faqs.question: When will I get my refund?
faqs.answer: Within 7–10 business days after we receive and inspect the goods.

faqs.question: Can I exchange instead of refund?
faqs.answer: Yes—exchanges ship once the return scans in, or with a new deposit.

faqs.question: What if my item arrives damaged?
faqs.answer: Report within 48h with photos; we’ll repair, replace, or refund fast.

faqs.question: Warranty length?
faqs.answer: 2-year warranty on manufacturing defects; specific components may vary.

faqs.question: What’s not covered by warranty?
faqs.answer: Wear and tear, misuse, improper cleaning, UV fading, and commercial abuse.

faqs.question: Do you offer spare parts?
faqs.answer: Yes—feet, glides, hardware, cushions, and finish kits on request.

faqs.question: Do I need original packaging?
faqs.answer: Strongly recommended for returns. Replacement packaging can be purchased.

faqs.question: Can I return assembled items?
faqs.answer: Yes if safely repacked. Disassembly fees may apply for pickups.

faqs.question: Commercial warranties?
faqs.answer: Contract-grade lines include extended terms; ask for the spec sheet.

faqs.question: Can you customize sizes or finishes?
faqs.answer: Many pieces are customizable. Lead times and pricing will adjust.

faqs.question: Do colors match photos exactly?
faqs.answer: Natural materials vary. Order swatches to confirm tone and texture.

faqs.question: Can I order fabric/leather swatches?
faqs.answer: Yes—sample kits ship globally. Small fee may apply outside the EU.

faqs.question: Do you offer fire-rated fabrics/foams?
faqs.answer: Yes—BS 5852/Crib 5 and CAL TB117 options available on request.

faqs.question: Are products suitable for hotels/offices?
faqs.answer: Selected lines are contract-grade with abrasion and stability testing.

faqs.question: Do you provide 3D/2D files?
faqs.answer: Yes—3DS, DWG, FBX, and SketchUp models for most products.

faqs.question: Where are products made?
faqs.answer: Designed in Italy; manufactured in Italy and select EU partner workshops.

faqs.question: Do you offer outdoor finishes?
faqs.answer: Yes—marine-grade metals, UV-stable fabrics, and outdoor foams.

faqs.question: Weight capacity of seating?
faqs.answer: Most chairs/sofas are tested to 120–150 kg per seat; see specs.

faqs.question: Do you include floor protectors?
faqs.answer: Yes—felt or nylon glides depending on the model.

faqs.question: Are finishes low-VOC?
faqs.answer: We prioritize water-based/low-VOC finishes; details in data sheets.

faqs.question: What wood do you use?
faqs.answer: Primarily FSC-certified European oak, ash, walnut, and beech.

faqs.question: Can I request a custom RAL color?
faqs.answer: Yes—MOQ and surcharge apply. Provide RAL/Pantone reference.

faqs.question: Do you offer left/right configurations?
faqs.answer: Sectionals and corner units can be ordered L/R—check product page.

faqs.question: How do I clean wood furniture?
faqs.answer: Dry dust weekly; wipe with damp soft cloth and mild soap. No harsh chemicals.

faqs.question: How do I care for leather?
faqs.answer: Vacuum gently, wipe with damp cloth, condition every 6–12 months.

faqs.question: Fabric care tips?
faqs.answer: Blot spills, avoid rubbing, test cleaners, and use fabric protection if offered.

faqs.question: Outdoor care?
faqs.answer: Cover during winter, clean regularly, store cushions dry and ventilated.

faqs.question: Do you sell touch-up kits?
faqs.answer: Yes—finish pens and oil/wax kits matched to our standard finishes.

faqs.question: Do you use FSC wood?
faqs.answer: Yes—FSC-certified sources across core collections.

faqs.question: Foam and textile standards?
faqs.answer: Options include OEKO-TEX® Standard 100 and low-emission foams.

faqs.question: Packaging sustainability?
faqs.answer: We use recyclable cardboard, paper tape, and right-size packing.

faqs.question: Do you offer EPDs?
faqs.answer: Environmental Product Declarations available for select items.

faqs.question: Country of origin labeling?
faqs.answer: Commercial invoices and labels state origin per regulations.

faqs.question: REACH/Prop 65 compliance?
faqs.answer: Materials are screened; product-level statements provided on request.

faqs.question: Do you repair rather than replace?
faqs.answer: We prioritize repair and provide parts to extend product life.

faqs.question: Do you offset carbon?
faqs.answer: We invest in efficiency first; select shipments can be carbon-offset.

faqs.question: Do you have a trade program?
faqs.answer: Yes—volume pricing, project support, and net terms (on approval).

faqs.question: How do I apply for trade terms?
faqs.answer: Submit your company details and VAT/tax ID on our Trade page.

faqs.question: What’s your MOQ for custom?
faqs.answer: Depends on item/finish—typically 10–50 units. Ask for a quote.

faqs.question: Do you provide pro-forma invoices?
faqs.answer: Yes—valid for 14 days with specs, lead times, and payment terms.

faqs.question: Can you source non-catalog items?
faqs.answer: We can develop or source equivalents if specs are clear.

faqs.question: Do you offer on-site installation?
faqs.answer: Yes—project installs via our logistics partners and crews.

faqs.question: Can you ship under my account?
faqs.answer: Yes—EXW/FCA terms with your carrier and instructions.

faqs.question: Can you meet tender specs?
faqs.answer: Share drawings and standards; we’ll confirm conformity or alternates.

faqs.question: Do you label for hospitality
faqs.answer: We can add room tags, barcodes, and packing lists per room.

faqs.question: Do you provide MSDS/SDS?
faqs.answer: Safety data for finishes/adhesives available on request.

faqs.question: Do I need an account to order?
faqs.answer: No, but accounts speed checkout and store invoices and addresses.

faqs.question: How do I update my address or VAT ID?
faqs.answer: Log in → Account → Billing/Addresses, then save changes.

faqs.question: How do you handle my data?
faqs.answer: We only use it to fulfill orders and support you. See our Privacy Policy.

faqs.question: Can I delete my account?
faqs.answer: Yes—request via support. We’ll remove non-essential data after legal holds.

faqs.question: Do you store card details?
faqs.answer: No—our payment processor tokenizes them. We don’t see full numbers.

faqs.question: What are your support hours?
faqs.answer: Mon–Fri, 9:00–18:00 CET via chat, email, and phone.

faqs.question: Language support?
faqs.answer: English and Italian on all channels; other languages by email.

faqs.question: Can I save items to a wishlist?
faqs.answer: Yep—tap the heart. Wishlists sync across your devices when logged in.

faqs.question: Do product pages include dimensions?
faqs.answer: Yes—full specs with width, depth, height, seat height, and packaging.

faqs.question: Do you support AR or room visualization?
faqs.answer: For select items we offer AR models on mobile and scale diagrams.

faqs.question: Can I download assembly guides?
faqs.answer: PDFs are on each product page and in your order email.

faqs.question: Accessibility features?
faqs.answer: Keyboard navigation, alt text, and contrast compliant pages.

faqs.question: What if an item is out of stock?
faqs.answer: You can pre-order; we show estimated restock dates on the page.

faqs.question: Do you accept backorders?
faqs.answer: Yes—charged at checkout; cancellable until production starts.

faqs.question: Can I reserve stock?
faqs.answer: We hold items for 48h after a pro-forma is issued.

faqs.question: Will my order ship partially?
faqs.answer: Choose split shipment at checkout or consolidate to one delivery.

faqs.question: How accurate are ETAs?
faqs.answer: We update ETAs if suppliers or carriers change schedules.

faqs.question: Will the furniture fit?
faqs.answer: Measure doorways, hallways, and elevators. Compare to our spec sheet.

faqs.question: Do you call before arrival?
faqs.answer: Freight calls/texts a time window; White-Glove confirms a slot.

faqs.question: Do you assemble everything?
faqs.answer: White-Glove includes assembly; curbside/inside doesn’t by default.

faqs.question: Do you remove packaging?
faqs.answer: White-Glove includes packaging removal and cleanup.

faqs.question: What ID do I need?
faqs.answer: A matching government ID and order number for release.

faqs.question: How do I file a claim?
faqs.answer: Open a ticket with order number, photos, and a description within 48h.

faqs.question: Do you send a technician?
faqs.answer: For repairable issues, yes—authorized techs handle warranty fixes.

faqs.question: Do you cover consequential losses?
faqs.answer: No—coverage is limited to the product and delivery per our Terms.

faqs.question: How long do swatches take to arrive?
faqs.answer: EU: 5–7 days. International: 7–14 depending on service.

faqs.question: How many swatches can I order?
faqs.answer: Up to 10 free; larger sets billed and refundable against purchase.

faqs.question: How do I reach support?
faqs.answer: Email [support@yourbrand.com](mailto:support@yourbrand.com), chat via site, or call/WhatsApp +39-XXX-XXX-XXXX (Mon–Fri, 9:00–18:00 CET).
